original: Be-Unique is an innovative online clothing platform that seeks to revolutionize the fashion industry by bridging the gap between customers' individual needs and the offerings of traditional clothing stores. With the integration of technology, Be-Unique aims to transform the way people shop for clothes and promote customer satisfaction in the process. This essay will explore the concept of Be-Uniqu
